noEmptySource.description:
Description

Disallow empty sources.
A source containing only the following is considered empty:
Whitespace (spaces, tabs or newlines)
Comments
noEmptySource.option:
allowCommentsSection titled “allowComments”
Whether the comments should be marked as meaningful.
When this option has been set totrue, a file with only comments is considered valid.
Defaultfalse
